column1: ChangesMade:Add S3 Infrequent Access storage and S3 Glacier, Increased the Basic Checks Within AWS (3000) of Route 53, Doubled the storage amount of RDS for MySQL and EC2(m4.large), add ElastiCache to provide secure, blazing fast performance
